response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and significance, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is a fair reflection of its true worth while also providing you with significant savings compared to its market value. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
